headline.main: Celebrities and Elite Unleash Tech-Themed Outfits at Met Gala
headline.print_headline: Celebrities and Elite Unleash Tech-Themed Outfits at Met Gala

docs.snippet: Celebrities and the elite unleashed tech-themed haute couture at the Met Gala on Monday night in New York, lighting up the Twittersphere much like a dress worn by Claire Danes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Celebrities and the elite unleashed tech-themed haute couture at the Met Gala on Monday night in New York, lighting up the Twittersphere much like a dress worn by Claire Danes.

headline.main: Los Angeles Chef, Chicago's Alinea Win Big at Beard Awards
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Chef, Chicago's Alinea Win Big at Beard Awards

docs.snippet: Chef Suzanne Goin took home the outstanding chef award Monday night at the James Beard Awards, and Chicago mainstay Alinea won the outstanding restaurant honor at a ceremony many consider the Academy Awards of the culinary world....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chef Suzanne Goin took home the outstanding chef award Monday night at the James Beard Awards, and Chicago mainstay Alinea won the outstanding restaurant honor at a ceremony many consider the Academy Awards of the culinary world.

headline.main: Hammel Goes to 4-0, Rizzo Hits 2 Doubles in Cubs' Win
headline.print_headline: Hammel Goes to 4-0, Rizzo Hits 2 Doubles in Cubs' Win

docs.snippet: Jason Hammel raised his record to 4-0 and Anthony Rizzo hit two doubles as the Chicago Cubs beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 7-2 on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jason Hammel raised his record to 4-0 and Anthony Rizzo hit two doubles as the Chicago Cubs beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 7-2 on Monday night.

headline.main: Cavaliers Beat Hawks in Series Opener
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers Beat Hawks in Series Opener

docs.snippet: A week off did not disrupt the Cleveland Cavaliers' momentum, nor was it enough time to alter the Atlanta Hawks' history against them. The Cavaliers still have never lost to the Hawks in the postseason, but this one was not easy....
docs.lead_paragraph: A week off did not disrupt the Cleveland Cavaliers' momentum, nor was it enough time to alter the Atlanta Hawks' history against them. The Cavaliers still have never lost to the Hawks in the postseason, but this one was not easy.

headline.main: Hoarse but Energetic, Bernie Sanders Presses for Votes in Indiana

docs.snippet: The senator held three rallies to court Indiana’s voters, who go to the polls on Tuesday, and stressed the state’s importance in his push to win the Democratic presidential nomination....
docs.abstract: The senator held three rallies to court Indiana’s voters, who go to the polls on Tuesday, and stressed the state’s importance in his push to win the Democratic presidential nomination.

headline.main: Police Identify Girl Killed in Ejection From Carnival Ride
headline.print_headline: Police Identify Girl Killed in Ejection From Carnival Ride

docs.snippet: A teenage girl who was killed when she was ejected from a whirling ride at an El Paso church carnival has been identified by police....
docs.lead_paragraph: A teenage girl who was killed when she was ejected from a whirling ride at an El Paso church carnival has been identified by police.

headline.main: The 20 Best Metallic (and Very Futuristic) Met Gala Looks

headline.main: Real Banking on Ronaldo Goal Power Against City
headline.print_headline: Real Banking on Ronaldo Goal Power Against City

docs.snippet: Real Madrid are hoping the fit-again Cristiano Ronaldo can lead them into the Champions League final although strike partner Karim Benzema remains a doubt for Wednesday's return match with Manchester City....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid are hoping the fit-again Cristiano Ronaldo can lead them into the Champions League final although strike partner Karim Benzema remains a doubt for Wednesday's return match with Manchester City.

headline.main: Mazara Hits Tiebreaking HR, Rangers Beat Blue Jays 2-1
headline.print_headline: Mazara Hits Tiebreaking HR, Rangers Beat Blue Jays 2-1

docs.snippet: Nomar Mazara hit a tiebreaking home run in the eighth inning and the Texas Rangers beat the Toronto Blue Jays 2-1 on Monday night for their fifth win in six games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nomar Mazara hit a tiebreaking home run in the eighth inning and the Texas Rangers beat the Toronto Blue Jays 2-1 on Monday night for their fifth win in six games.
